page.title: 17Health food shop, St Ives
page.content: This health food shop in St Ives is called The Good Life. It is open six days a week from 9.15 am to 5.00 pm. It contains a wide variety of unprocessed food, dried fruit, herbs, spices, nuts, beans and various types of unprocessed flour. The products come from all over the world. Some roots, to flavour cooking come, from China whilst many herbs are grown in Britain. The shop owner believes that people are now more careful about what they eat - wanting less heavily processed food which has much natural goodness taken out. He enjoys advising people on the use of herbs and spices in cooking and sells a number of books on this subject. He stocks homeopathic medicines and herbs with medicinal properties and will give information on their use but does not go against the advice of a qualified doctor.
